description: Gets the details of a resource-based policy that is attached to a custom model, including the JSON body of the policy.

parameters.name: ResourceArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the custom model version that has the resource policy.

nested_items.name: ResourcePolicy
nested_items.description: The JSON body of the resource-based policy.

nested_items.name: CreationTime
nested_items.description: The time at which the policy was created.

nested_items.name: LastModifiedTime
nested_items.description: The time at which the policy was last modified.

nested_items.name: PolicyRevisionId
nested_items.description: The revision ID of the policy. Each time you modify a policy, Amazon Comprehend assigns a new revision ID, and it deletes the prior version of the policy.
